example.description: This example describes the status of the bun-57a5403e bundle task.

example.code:
PS C:\>$filter1 = New-Object Amazon.EC2.Model.Filter PS C:\>$filter1.Name = "s3-bucket" PS C:\>$filter1.Values = "myawsbucket"
PS C:\>$filter2 = New-Object Amazon.EC2.Model.Filter PS C:\>$filter2.Name = "state" PS C:\>$filter2.Values = @( "complete", "failed" )
PS C:\>Get-EC2BundleTask -Filter @( $filter1, $filter2 )
example.description: This example filters the response to include only bundle tasks whose state is either complete or failed, and in addition are targeted for the Amazon S3 bucket named "myawsbucket".
